Name: Nurture Cape
LongDescription: Earns Exp. Points every time the Pokémon takes damage. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Happiny, Chansey, and Blissey.  You can get a Nurture Cape at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Happiny Dew, a Happiny Card, and a Play Tag. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
